name: Mayana
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Mayana is a game to combat procrastination. This game is connected to https://tasksboard.com/  and tracks your late and in-progress tasks. Whenever a late task pops up, your pet gets damage. On the contrary, when you finish a task, you are rewarded coins that allow you to buy health and other cosmetic items in the shop

CREDITS:

PROGRAMMERS:

Jan Carlo San Juan

Aljon Tungol

Bruce Miranda

Garret Villanueva

Artists:

Jan Carlo San Juan

Asher Angeles

How to play:

On fresh installation, sign-in using your google account. Check the boxes in the login page to allow the app to access your account's google tasks then press continue. 

To add tasks, go to  https://tasksboard.com/ and sign-in using the same google account. 

All the tasks will be reflected in the game.
